name: Avoid "elseif" statements (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all artifacts containing "elseif" statements.
output:
This report lists all artifacts containing "elseif" statements.

This QR provides the following information:
Artifact full name.
rationale: For readability reasons, "elseif" statements should be avoided.
remediation: Modify the source code to replace "elseif" statements with "else if".
remediationSample:
<?php
$a = 10;
$b = 20;
if ( $a > $b ) {
    echo "a is bigger than b", PHP_EOL;
    }
else if ( $a === $b ) {   //VIOLATION REMOVED
    echo "a is equal to b", PHP_EOL;
    }
else {
    echo "a is smaller than b", PHP_EOL;
    }
?>
